name: mytimer-app
description: myTimer App is a Python Flask-based web application designed to help anyone manage tasks with a simple timer interface. The app allows one to start, track, and stop timers, with durations displayed dynamically in real-time.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && bash -c 'source myEnv/bin/activate && flask run --no-reload --host=0.0.0.0 --port=5000 &' FLASK_PID=$! && sleep 20 && curl --fail http://localhost:5000/render && kill $FLASK_PID || (kill $FLASK_PID 2>/dev/null || true; exit 1) && rsync -av --exclude='.git' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='scripts' --exclude='*.log' ./ dist/
